newsitem.title: USA: Deltek IPO offers 2.9 mln shrs at $11/shr.
newsitem.headline: Deltek IPO offers 2.9 mln shrs at $11/shr.

text.p: Deltek Systems Inc on Wednesday announced an initial public offering of 2.9 million common shares at an initial price of $11 per share.
The company said it is offering 1.7 million of the shares, and selling shareholders are offering the remaining 1.2 million.

The offering was managed by Montgomery Securities and William Blair & Co. Certain of the selling shareholders have granted the underwriters a 30-day option to buy up to 435,000 additional shares to cover over-allotments, if any.
The company said net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including product development, working capital and potential acquisitions.
